Name: BasedOnReference
Description: A reference to an object upon which the current object is based using a standard Reference structure. Repeat for multiple base objects. The TypeOfObject may be any Versionable or Maintainable object.

Name: BasedOnRationaleDescription
Description: Textual description of the rationale/purpose for the based on reference to inform users as to the extent and implication of the version change. May be expressed in multiple languages.

Name: BasedOnRationaleCode
Description: RationaleCode is primarily for internal processing flags within an organization or system. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.
